title: How to Properly Use a Hand Cannon in Destiny

steps.headline: Grab a Hand cannon (any old hand cannon that you have unlocked will do).
Start by learning your play style with the gun (whether you prefer accuracy or rapid shots).
Go and test your skill in Crucible or Osiris, or any game mode with other players.
Learn how other players react to it and try and gain as many kills as you can.
See if you want to try another hand cannon.
steps.description: If you like the one you have, then you can keep it and continue to perfect your skill with it.

steps.headline: Make sure you know your way around a hand cannon and its recoil.
steps.description: Don't try and take the speedy way; hand cannons are low fire rate and high impact.

steps.headline: Try to land as many precision shots in a row as possible, this results in high damage and quick dispatch of your foes.
Have fun, and stay safe Guardians!
